articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Former guerilla and leftist Gustavo Petro wins Colombian election over millionaire 'king of TikTok' - ABC News
articles.description: Former rebel Gustavo Petro becomes the first leftist president in Colombia's history. Vowing for profound social reforms, Mr Petro's win marks the start of a radical new path for the South American country that has long marginalised the left.
articles.content: Gustavo Petro, a leftist former member of the M-19 guerilla movement who has vowed profound social and economic change, has won Colombia's presidency, the first progressive to do so in the country's … [+4530 chars]

articles.title: THE Show 2022: Astell&Kern KANN MAX DAP - ecoustics.com - ecoustics
articles.description: T.H.E. Show 2022 attendees saw the N. American debut of the Astell&Kern KANN MAX DAP. Get our early thoughts before our full review.
articles.content: The Astell & Kern KANN MAX DAP made its global debut at High-End Munich recently; and with great fanfare because it represents quite a jump in performance for the category. DAPs are still a thing… [+5885 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind, CNN Business
articles.title: The most popular air travel day this year was a mess. That won't change anytime soon - CNN
articles.description: Americans gained a new federal holiday last year: Juneteenth. This year the holiday, which commemorates of the end of slavery in the United States, falls on Sunday but it will be observed in many places on Monday, June 20.

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: TikTok and Oracle teamed up after all, but concerns about data privacy remain - The Verge
articles.description: TikTok says it has begun routing American users’ data to servers owned by the US-based Oracle, but a report from BuzzFeed News indicates TikTok employees in China had access to this information for months.
articles.content:
A report indicates China had access to US users data
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
